inputs.selection_motivation: Fed policy decisions directly influence USD strength, which drives the USD/CNY exchange rate; linking Fed Policy to USD/CNY captures the causal transmission from monetary policy to the cross.
inputs.candidate_motivation: USD/CNY is driven by US monetary conditions (Fed policy, Treasury yields, SOFR), US macro data (inflation, unemployment), the USD index, and China’s credit environment and export performance; it also moves in tandem with other major cross‑rates such as USD/JPY, GBP/USD and EURUSD.

proposed_link.motivation: Fed policy decisions directly influence USD strength, which drives the USD/CNY exchange rate; linking Fed Policy to USD/CNY captures the causal transmission from monetary policy to the cross.
